description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote registry service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43532):

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (x64 or 32-bit).
2. Download the relevant update package from the links below.
3. Install the update as per your system requirements.
4. Restart your system to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update resolves an important security vulnerability that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on affected systems. Ensure your system is on one of the specified build numbers for compatibility. 

**Update Packages**:
- Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
- Additional packages for other versions are available from the catalog links provided.
